name: FREE DEMO - Neumorphic App figma
description:
Full version available on UI8

https://ui8.net/broworks/products/dark-universe---photo-editing-app-neumorphic-ui-kit-dark-mode?status=6


Dark Universe is the name of our photo editing app in dark mode. We heard so many positive comments on our idea shot for this app on social media, that we decided to create a complete app, but in dark mode using a popular style called Neumorphism.


We created 31+ screens for you to use it, but there is more. The app is fully customizable, which means that we created components/symbols very carefully for every popular design software Adobe XD, Figma & Sketch. So now you can just drag and drop and create more screens or even some completely different app with ease.


All layers are labeled properly, typography and colors are also easily changeable on all screens.

We use Google fonts in our projects and in this case, we used popular Poppins font, which is completely free to download.


As a bonus, we also included a set of FREE 60+ icons withing this UI Kit.


We will highly appreciate your support and if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us in the comments section below, or email us directly at support@broworks.net and we will be more than happy to help you.
